message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can call it a day!
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can't do much better than this, right?
Not bad, but I'm not done yet! I want a bit more.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive now. Accept or face the consequences!
You're getting a bit too aggressive, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better offer. Don't make me regret it!
Not yet, Bob! I'm not backing down.
I'm not getting any softer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're really squeezing me now, Alice. I'm making one last attempt to get a better deal. Take it or leave it!
Fine, Bob. I'll take it. You got a good deal.
